audioText: Elle croit fermement que son destin est lié à cette ancienne prophétie découverte dans les archives familiales.
question: What does she firmly believe about her destiny?
options: It is connected to an ancient prophecy found in family archives
It depends entirely on her personal choices and efforts
It will be revealed through dreams and meditation
It is written in the stars and cannot be changed
explanation: The text states 'Elle croit fermement que son destin est lié à cette ancienne prophétie découverte dans les archives familiales.' - She firmly believes that her destiny is linked to this ancient prophecy discovered in the family archives. The noun 'destin' means destiny, fate, or future.
